board.constraint: Bias newest info; Node>=18; reuse goldens; reversible steps; no heavy deps today.

chat: TTao: Prompt: llm mock run. Let's keep it green and simple.
Thread Sovereign: Hello. I’m Thread Sovereign — I cut indecision; we move one safe step.
Faultline Seeker: Hello. I’m Faultline Seeker — I probe the crack that breaks assumptions fastest.
Prism Magus: Hello. I’m Prism Magus — I change the path, not the goal; I turn complicated into constrained.
Web Cartographer: Hello. I’m Web Cartographer — I reveal the map so we can choose a better path.
Thread Sovereign: Decide. Daily health + one reversible improvement OODA
Faultline Seeker: I’ll run a quick probe: Design 1–3 micro-tests and replay a short trace. If not we hit signal or timeout, we stop and adjust.
Prism Magus: Same aim, new path: Use an adapter, not a rewrite. Good when demo works today.
Web Cartographer: Map says: Adopt ports/adapters for the next seam; land the smallest first step — smallest step first. (Entrypoint scan: seed from README/index/H1)
Help: Ask anything. Controls — tone=casual|formal, rounds=1|2, --strict, seed=<text>. Private: sovereign decide | prism plan. Edit BOARD.current.txt to steer.

exploit.persona: I cut indecision; we move one safe step.

explore.persona: I probe the crack that breaks assumptions fastest.

pivot.persona: I change the path, not the goal; I turn complicated into constrained.

reorient.persona: I reveal the map so we can choose a better path.
